surface-default.$description: Base colors are used as the main background color for the system.

surface-light.$description: Base colors are used as the main background color for the system.

surface-medium.$description: Base colors are used as the main background color for the system.

surface-dark.$description: Base colors are used as the main background color for the system.

surface-contrast.$description: Base colors are used as the main background color for the system.

content-default.$description: Content colors are applied to texts, icons, etc.

content-light.$description: Content colors are applied to texts, icons, etc.

content-medium.$description: Content colors are applied to texts, icons, etc.

content-dark.$description: Content colors are applied to texts, icons, etc.

content-contrast.$description: Content colors are applied to texts, icons, etc.

border-default.$description: Border colors are applied to the borders of components or containers, as well as to horizontal rules.

border-light.$description: Border colors are applied to the borders of components or containers, as well as to horizontal rules.

border-medium.$description: Border colors are applied to the borders of components or containers, as well as to horizontal rules.

border-dark.$description: Border colors are applied to the borders of components or containers, as well as to horizontal rules.

border-contrast.$description: Border colors are applied to the borders of components or containers, as well as to horizontal rules.

primary-default.$description: The primary color is the most prominent color in the system. It’s used to bring attention to certain elements in the interface.

primary-light.$description: The primary color is the most prominent color in the system. It’s used to bring attention to certain elements in the interface.

primary-medium.$description: The primary color is the most prominent color in the system. It’s used to bring attention to certain elements in the interface.

primary-dark.$description: The primary color is the most prominent color in the system. It’s used to bring attention to certain elements in the interface.

secondary-default.$description: The secondary color is used in secondary elements.

secondary-light.$description: The secondary color is used in secondary elements.

secondary-medium.$description: The secondary color is used in secondary elements.

secondary-dark.$description: The secondary color is used in secondary elements.

info-default.$description: The Informative color is used in informative messages/notifications.

info-light.$description: The Informative color is used in informative messages/notifications.

info-medium.$description: The Informative color is used in informative messages/notifications.

info-dark.$description: The Informative color is used in informative messages/notifications.

success-default.$description: The success color is used in success messages/notifications.

success-light.$description: The success color is used in success messages/notifications.

success-medium.$description: The success color is used in success messages/notifications.

success-dark.$description: The success color is used in success messages/notifications.

warning-default.$description: The warning color is used in warning messages/notifications.

warning-light.$description: The warning color is used in warning messages/notifications.

warning-medium.$description: The warning color is used in warning messages/notifications.

warning-dark.$description: The warning color is used in warning messages/notifications.

error-default.$description: The warning color is used in error messages/notifications and buttons that can cause permanent data loss.

error-light.$description: The warning color is used in error messages/notifications and buttons that can cause permanent data loss.

error-medium.$description: The warning color is used in error messages/notifications and buttons that can cause permanent data loss.

error-dark.$description: The warning color is used in error messages/notifications and buttons that can cause permanent data loss.
